title: Sportscast - October 1, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 1, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Thu, Oct 01 2015, 11:53 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 1, 2015. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires Entertainment News 
BILL COSBY - NEW INVESTIGATION 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- So far, Bill Cosby has never been charged with a crime -- despite dozens of women coming forward to claim he sexually assaulted them, in some cases after drugging them. 
THAT'S "ONE WAY" TO ADOPT A PUPPY 
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) -- And they called it puppy love -- and with good reason, too. Business News 
Major business and economic reports scheduled for today 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Investors will be dissecting today's September employment report from the Labor Department.. A strong hiring report would likely raise expectations that the Federal Reserve will increase its benchmark interest rate before the end of the year. 
IN THE NEWS: T-MOBILE DATA HACK 
NEW YORK (AP) -- It's nervous time for subscribers of T-Mobile.
